short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Opens current tab to a new tab on localhost

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Aimed to frontend developpers, this extension allows you to duplicate your current tab to a new one on a specific port. By default, the addon will take you to localhost:3000 but you can change this port in the options.
